lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: everyone should get the chance to fulfil his/her dreams...and... I love to see a smile on people's faces

lender.name: Dinner Divas
lender.loan_because: Because we want to share out of the generosity we have experienced, especially from our families.
lender.occupational_info: We all do different kinds of work, 2 are graduate students, 2 are Nurses, one works for a museum, one investigates fair labor practices, one is a chef, one is a lady of leisure, one is an Episcopal priest.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.loan_because: Because They're worth every penney!!!!

lender.name: J. Powers
lender.loan_because: earning your own way is the best social program for everything--health, education, you name it. To be an entrepreneur isn't an "occupation," and all entrepreneurs together do not constitute a "profession." Entrepreneurship is the primal human activity of adding real value.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, I'm a graduate student studying toward my Ph.D. in Architectural History. Ultimately, I aim to influence my culture so that they build more sanely.

lender.name: Ling Domenici
lender.loan_because: I just love to see more people become self-sufficient through organizations like kiva. Tough time or not, we must move on, so thanks to Kiva to link people together.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of three partners of a company which markets Carmien rooibos tea in China.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.occupational_info: co-founder of @thirdwaveberlin & @cocities. simple food, fine coffee, city living. everything is interesting to me.

lender.name: Wolfy
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to helping other peoples :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm developing hospital informatic systems

lender.name: Randulo Zeeek
lender.loan_because: We're lucky to be able to help other people on the planet by giving them a chance to self-support and determination. The gift of dignity is priceless.
lender.occupational_info: Kiva.org is one of the keys to self-determination, dignity and renewable income.

lender.name: Alasdair
lender.loan_because: I have the money and they don't.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Government Relations.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a wonderful program helping people take action in their lives
lender.occupational_info: I maintain specifications for a major manufacturing company

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: My daughter told me about Kiva.org and how great an organization it is. She was very convincing, so I checked it out. I like supporting good causes, and I feel this will be worth it.

lender.name: Yasmin & Craig
lender.loan_because: We must. It is a small attempt to try and make a difference somewhere, for someone.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Sometimes it takes a village.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Rubina
lender.loan_because: supporting local economies around the world can help bring about economic justice.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who live near toxic chemicals to protect themselves. I also like to write and visit my grandmother in Mexico.

lender.name: Mara
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Weaver, working with threads.

lender.name: Jaireh
lender.loan_because: Seems like a great idea!

lender.name: Liisa
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to share with others and to help to make the world for at least some people a little better place.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I care about giving back to our world...giving to allow others to have opportunities that otherwise they may not have. To show my children what giving is all about.

lender.name: Tyler Willis
lender.occupational_info: I build tools that companies use in developing their advertising.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I like helping people realizing their potential.
lender.occupational_info: As freelance musician, I do a lot of modern gospel music, as well as other styles.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It feels so good to empower people to prosper and create flourishing lives for themselves and their families by extending them a helping hand rather than a hand-out. And it's wonderful that Kiva empowers me to leverage a small amount of money into making a big impact on people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I remodel people's homes to make them nicer to live in. After work, I enjoy paddling my kayak along the shores of the beautiful island I live on, near Seattle, Washington.

lender.name: SW Econ Students
lender.loan_because: We realize that as American students we are very fortunate. Loaning with Kiva will demonstrate that a small sum of money can have an immense impact.

lender.name: Alessandra e Marcello
lender.loan_because: Quando si può aiutare qualcuno, perchè non farlo?
lender.occupational_info: Siamo una famiglia!!

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I see with kiva ALL the money going to the people who really need it. Too many charities take too much of your donation for administrative fees, not so with kiva, Keep up the good work. One person at a time.

lender.name: Crystal Van Wieren
lender.loan_because: A positive future for the world depends on individual people coming together in an effort to improve and enrich others' lives. I feel it is part of my duty as a human being and humanitarian to help others and encourage people to do the same.

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: It is a small way I can share my good fortune in life with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help women take care of themselves to have a healthy pregnancy, safe birth and healthy babies.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can and it seems right that I should.

lender.name: Adaeze
lender.loan_because: i am a vitious girl trying to help myself to be come some thing in life. But i dont have any assistance.that is why i needed help from the (kiva)as soon as i heard of thier good news. Pls help.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student medicine 200level at university of Nnamdi Azikiwe Awka.Anambra State. Nigeria

lender.name: Katherine O
lender.loan_because: I love the Lord and my brothers and sisters across the world.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to live a better life. I have been lucky enough to live in a country were democracy and free enterprise have helped me to provide for my family. I hope in some small way my loan helps encourage those ideals in other parts of the world and makes some lives better in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the operation of a company that has 650 truck on the road hauling various consumer goods to retailers.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: We all should.
lender.occupational_info: I was a pediatric and Emergency room doctor.

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to be creative and fufill their dreams.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I like to just because.
lender.occupational_info: Forestry, tree doctor.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: people are important all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids to think.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to create real positive change in the world. I like the idea that the money I've committed can be recycled when loans are repaid.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupation: teacher; training to be a nurse-midwife

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone in the world needs help sometimes, and they should get it. Creo que todas las personas del mundo necesitan ayuda a veces, y deben recibirla.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the Internet easier to use. Hago el Internet mas facil que usar.

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because: Instead of a handout, this service rewards perseverance and helps people who want to better their life through hard work and diligence!
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer

lender.name: SF Bay Area Supper Club
lender.loan_because: My name is Tom and I manage a Supper Club of about 20-25 people. We get to enjoy the incredible bounty of the San Francisco Bay Area by cooking a great feast about every six weeks. Because we are so blessed, we want to share our bounty with others. Especially of they are in, or want to be in, the food business.
lender.occupational_info: Every week, I go to people's homes and cook a week's worth of food for them.

lender.name: Adam Gullen
lender.loan_because: I believe Microlending has the ability to improve the living conditions of large numbers of people throughout this world. Many individuals in the more developed nations can afford to help those out who are in need, and I choose to do so.

lender.name: howard
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small contribution to the elimination of poverty and believe in the bottom-up approach of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with wealth find ways to give to those in great need to promote economic development.

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because: the best, most permanent changes are typically the sum of many smaller improvements.
lender.occupational_info: U. S. Coast Guard

lender.name: Margret
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people who may just need a few helping hands to help themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to school children age 10-18.

lender.name: Lili & Rob
lender.occupational_info: surface/web designers

lender.name: Barbara and Bob
lender.occupation: retired postal worker and retired draftsman
lender.loan_because: Our granddaughter gave us a Christmas gift to make a loan and we matched it with our funds so we could make 2 loans.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now, but I taught biology at the University of Minnesota for 38 years

lender.name: Sue & Chuck
lender.loan_because: We loan because it's a more efficient way to get needed funds to people who can use them.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I stayed at home until my children were all in school. I was a teacher for 12 years. Then, I became Director of an Interfaith organization doing social services in our local area.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to help another.
lender.occupational_info: I describe and show the value of arts education.

lender.name: Lauren and Stephen
lender.loan_because: This loan was a Christmas gift to us from our Aunt Tricey. We are loaning it because we want to help people help their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are full time 7th grade and 4th grade students. Our job is to work hard, get good grades to make it to 8th and 5th grade, and eventually to college.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: when I lived in Congo I saw the need for microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a MicroLoan initative at St Cloud State University.

lender.name: Valerie and Geoff
lender.loan_because: We're all connected, one way or another.
lender.occupational_info: Valerie develops renewable wind energy projects and Geoff designs houses and buildings.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: After all this years of people given to me their unconditional love, care and trust. As they did it for me and now is time to give it back.
lender.occupational_info: Teach Tennis to all types of people. All ages as well.

lender.name: Sam & Emmie
lender.loan_because: To those who have been given much, much is expected. We are so stinkin' blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Sam teaches 8 year olds in an urban public school. Emmie lends money to businesses on behalf of a small local bank in Portland.

lender.name: Peggy & Rick
lender.occupation: Rick is an artist; Peggy is a feng shui consultant
lender.loan_because: It is our way of giving back and showing our gratitude for all that we are blessed with. We like the aspect of direct micro loans to those that need them and are willing to make positive changes in their lives.

lender.name: John Dooley
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is the miracle cure for poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, Musician, and student of the world.

lender.name: Hect, Giz & Fred
lender.loan_because: it is what I would have someone else do unto me if I were in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and simply travel in my small camper in search of new friends and joyous occasions.

lender.name: tatsushi
lender.loan_because: I hope my small money is helpful to something.
lender.occupational_info: I am a japanese software engineer. I can make some programs on windows. I can't speake english well, but I can understand japanese well.

lender.name: Carlos Fernandez Fuente
lender.loan_because: Think in a social and green way, the social green change is possible ;-)
lender.occupational_info: Expanding new ideas and growing projects

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I have benefited from loans myself, and enjoyed traveling in many of the regions I have made loans in.
lender.occupational_info: I help governments and industry meet environmental laws, to keep our air, rivers, and land clean.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I've been so lucky to be born into the circumstances I was born into. This is my way of helping others who, because of mere happenstance, aren't as lucky as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the court system, helping the judges decide the cases before them.

lender.name: Parham
lender.loan_because: I don't wish any institutional bank to give money to those in need. Together with patience, we can bring down the corrupted and greedy worldwide banking system...

lender.name: angel
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP.AND GIVE BACK THE BLESSING GOD HAS GIVE ME.
lender.occupational_info: NOT AS HARD, AS WHAT I SEE OTHER PEOPLE DO TO CREATE A LIVING FOR THEMSELVES AND THERE FAMILIES.

lender.name: SAGA (Alex)
lender.loan_because: the world does not lack courage -- only opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student trying to start an organization that inspires others to live with an open mind when faced with the challenges of global disparity.

lender.name: Nurcan/Ufuk
lender.loan_because: for a better world.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe its good to give others a chance to fullfill there desires.
lender.occupational_info: Exciting, and every day brings a new challenge.

lender.name: jacqui
lender.occupation: Asst Director of a university research institute
lender.occupational_info: I study the impact of how human institutions affect resources--for example, how the rules established by a community in Uganda affect the forest that provides their livelihood, or how an irrigation system can be maintained effectively by a group of farmers in Nepal.

lender.name: Arzu
lender.loan_because: I will open new classrooms and buy new toys for kids, and give much better education to kids
lender.occupational_info: baby day-care school

lender.name: Filip
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Frank & Cesar (My dog)
lender.loan_because: This really helps! I can help people helping themselves to a better life.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva Gift Certificate and I very much like it!
lender.occupational_info: Doing research on how small-scale sustainability initiatives can contribute to broader societal change.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed and provide for their families
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate meetings for companies and organizations

lender.name: RKW
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Colin & Helen
lender.occupation: Marine Search and Rescue & Wellness Facilitator
lender.loan_because: Extending beyond ourselves to others is where we experience deeper love and growth. It's adding value to our existence and rising towards our highest potential to inspire others to do the same - reinforcing the beauty in this world.
lender.occupational_info: In our lives we both offer assistance to others; inspiring

lender.name: Jason Towns
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and it feels good to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses, nonprofits and political campaigns take advantage of emerging technologies.

lender.name: Cem
lender.loan_because: It feels great to make a good change in people's life. I couldn't miss this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Work as a Human Resources Consultant, particularly on search&selection.

lender.name: Ben & Wilma
lender.loan_because: Helping people in need by way of a hand up, not a hand out, is the basis for all people to succeed. "Give a man a fish and feed him for a day, teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lender.occupational_info: I design kitchens & bathrooms for our local renovation and new home market.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to help someone directly.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small printing company designing jobs for clients on an Apple Mac computer system

lender.name: Larry and Susan
lender.loan_because: We want to help. This program shows the great things that can happen when people come together to help people.

lender.name: Jaco McGuinness
lender.loan_because: Helping someone realize a goal makes me feel good.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It expands my horizons and connects me with hard working people in communities I can only imagine.
lender.occupational_info: Manage software & system development for a large government agency concerned with improving local government finances.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: My mom told me about it, and I thought it was a good way to help people. And I like potato chips, so I thought I should invest in Mrs. Tavae's taro chips!
lender.occupational_info: I learn at home, skateboard, play Runescape, and hang out with my family and friends.

lender.name: Cody
lender.occupational_info: I write for a children's magazine. The magazine is used by teachers in schools to help kids learn about science.

lender.name: ozgur
lender.occupational_info: I go to people's houses or workplaces to fix their computer problems.

lender.name: merve
lender.loan_because: i just wanna help the people needs help

lender.name: azrin
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start operating a business and getting on in life. I have a disability and as I am unable to be a life saver anymore , I put my skills back in serving the community.Providing them with the education they need.
lender.occupational_info: I was a doctor till I got hurt in a UN Peace Keeping Mission. Now I teach and provide network security, e-commerce and other things to help someone run a business and grow online!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to give people across the world the opportunity to pursue their economic goals.

lender.name: OnLiveIT
lender.loan_because: Mivel fontosnak tartjuk, hogy a munkánkkal megtermelt jövedelem ne csak saját jólétünket szolgálja, az OnLiveIT elhatározta, hogy rendszeresen támogatja a KIVA-t és a kölcsönért folyamodókat.
lender.occupational_info:
Cégünk azzal a szándékkal jött létre, hogy a vállalati informatika területén szerzett évtizedes tapasztalatainkkal és az információ technológiai ipar legfejlettebb szoftver és hardver eszközeivel álljunk ügyfeleink szolgálatára.
Célunk, hogy olyan megoldásokat ajánljunk a szolgáltatásaink iránt érdeklödöknek, melyek nem csak egyedi problémákra nyújtanak gyógyírt, hanem valódi termelöerövé teszik szállítóink termékeiben megtestesülö tudást.
Valljuk, hogy az informatikai rendszerek, bár egyre fontosabb helyet foglalnak el a cégek életében, feladatuk a vállalati értékteremtö folyamatok minél hatékonyabb kiszolgálása, nem pedig az uralkodás azok felett.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Giving back seems only natural when you've been so fortunate yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I study why people act the way they do.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I want to help you.
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Julianna
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowering people this way will really change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I advise the Mayor and Councillors that govern our City how to make decisions, while playing by the rules.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Some people can use the money more wisely than I can.
lender.occupational_info: I study ways we can use computers (algorithms) to solve problems that are difficult for people to solve on their own.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I travel around the world and want to help out those in need.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps secure companies that do transactions on the Internet. I run a sales team.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home to take care of my children.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: it is my duty and my pleasure to share my blessings with others.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: long journeys begin with a single step with kiva i can help with many steps
lender.occupational_info: 8th grade special education teacher

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: God loves us all and He gave me more than enough.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an adoption agency to help kids deal with their past so they might move toward the future.

lender.name: Rico
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and the big hopes of small people striving for better lives from their microbusinesses. A little dash of opportunity goes a long way for a lot of people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Kiva for Southeast Asia and the Pacific

lender.name: Courage
lender.loan_because: I am a driver and a university student but dropped out because of money problems. I could not afford $2000 per year for 4 years course at the university college of criminal justice where I study security Management. I wish to loan some money to buy a taxi to work with to make a living as there is no other way for me to make money.
lender.occupational_info: I run errands online and offline, do some private investigation services having dropped out of the university. But I am also a commercial driver and I am loaning this money to buy a taxi.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I think if some people live in homes and make a living than all people deserve to.
lender.occupational_info: I like school because you learn and meet new people and have fun and learn at the same time.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupation: Executive for a multinational in Asia
lender.loan_because: Personal experiences during my youth in Africa as well as my thesis on a micro credit organization in Mali called Kafo Jiginew, amazed me on what impact micro credit could have on the improvement of people's life. Joining Kiva gives me the opportunity to support a development model I strongly believe in. Directly helping people with clear actions leading to tangible results is really motivating. And since I am blessed to have a great life it is only fair I give a little help for others to improve theirs...
lender.occupational_info: I work in Asia for a multinational specializing in the sales and distribution (logistics) of pharmaceutical products.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I started my business with only $2000. I have been very successful, but I could have grown much faster and it would have been much easier if I had access to capital. I want to encourage economic development around the world. Only through free enterprise can people raise their standard of living and help themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired - I only have four businesses now.

lender.name: Merrick
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people that are not as fortunate as we are.

lender.name: KayKay
lender.loan_because: I simply like the idea of "loans that change lives"...

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I'm a karma whore.
lender.occupational_info: Retain the earth.

lender.name: Dioni
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: jatraqueros
lender.loan_because: We are withdrawing our funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore we are withdrawing our funds and supporting other more humane organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I'm all about Books, Film, Food, and Culture. I keep my members informed about the latest and best of that stuff. Warning: I'm extremely addictive. My nickname is hatcrack.

lender.name: Nilufer
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful feeling to be able to help the other people in need all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: enjoyable!

lender.name: selvi
lender.loan_because: I believe you can create a big improvement in someone else's life by making a small contribution to them and then that person can make an improvement in another person's life and this can go on forever like a chain reaction.
lender.occupational_info: I'm self employed. I import construction materials. I also work in our family business which is tourism.

lender.name: Nigel
lender.loan_because: Let's see if this new-fangled "capitalism" works!

lender.name: adil
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel like one of those toffs on Dragon's Den

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer student currently in IT. I have a very strong interest in Linux and programming as well.

lender.name: Willie
lender.loan_because: I need a loan for Operating Capital of my Web Development Business. I am 39 years young and married with a thirteen year old beautiful daughter. I have a 3.7 grade point average (gpa) and I attend Kaplan University. I am pursueing a Bachelor's in Computer Science, Information Technology and Web Development. I graduate in June 2007, and I am seeking $3,750.00 for Operating Capital , this amount will cover my running of the business for the next 3 months until I can officially have the business running efficiently and effectively as a Web Designer.
lender.occupational_info: I am a general contractor that repairs and installs heating systems in homes and residential properties. Also, I am a Plumber that fixes drains and sewer problems.

lender.name: Jannes
lender.loan_because: What good is money if it can't help anyone?

lender.name: Dominique
lender.occupational_info: I'm working in a Web Agency

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: kihikau
lender.loan_because:
The Hawaiian word 'kihikau' means...
...to give generously from the heart without expectation of return
but to be truthful, I loan because it is Good and it feels Good.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: i have been lucky enough to have the privilege to have enough to help others. it is my duty to pass on my blessings. and you know what they say it's much better to give than to recieve
lender.occupational_info: i am a full time student at palm Beach Communnity college. i have a full time job. i am extremely busy but i enjoy every minute of my life. i have too many goals in life but if i accomplish half of them (which i will) my legacy will live on way beyond my time.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: Giving to these businesses helps the entire community, and it is giving people the opportunity to get themselves to a better life. It is a gift that lasts and once it is repaid it can be given back to help more people.
lender.occupational_info: I feed and care for miniature animals and a farm where people and children can come and learn about the animals. I am going to school to become a Veterinarian.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the global market. I grew up in Africa, so this is how I share my blessings with my childhood home.

lender.name: todd
lender.loan_because:
The repayment rate at Kiva.org is 100%! To put things into perspective; A lender has a higher chance of getting pregnant while using a condom than having a loan default!
I loan to Kiva because I am a capitalist and a big proponent of microfinancing. Over a span of of time, a small loan of just $50 can be used multiple times by several different entreprenuers to help start several different businesses. Talk about getting a bang for your buck and you get to feel good that you helped so many people!
Financing entrepreneurs is not only beneficial to the individual loaners but the emergence of small businesses also benefits the local economy. With economic growth comes improvement of living conditions and overall decrease in poverty. It's G-G-R-R-REAT!!
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to create layouts and designs for posters, websites, books, etc. . .

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I spent two years in the Peace Corps in Atakpame, Togo in West Africa. I understand the need for sustainable business and productive loans.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe that shared happiness is doubled happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I help websites giving their users a very good feeling, a delightful experience. It's like teaching a surfboard being a good ride ;-)

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the kindness of strangers.
lender.occupational_info: I protect people who have had money they invested stolen. Sometimes people don't pay attention. Sometimes they trust people they should not. I help them try to get their money back.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: ... it's an abundant universe.
lender.occupational_info: I create art quilts, mixed media collages, paintings, and photographs. I also help other artists get the business side of their art careers under control.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be given the capital means to get my own projects moving. I hope to help others access what they need to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the American wine industry

lender.name: Phip
lender.loan_because: I can, at least a little. Choices are based on my reading students' recommendations and discussions in my community college classes.
lender.occupational_info: Developmental English teacher.

lender.name: Sports Dave
lender.loan_because: not everyone makes a choice to be out on the street. I believe in helping the people who haven't chosen poverty to get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a graduate degree in theology.

lender.name: Gia
lender.loan_because: Loans have been important for me in my life and I think everyone deserves the same chance.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I enjoy Paying It Forward and helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I create graphic elements and designs for a creative services department.

lender.name: John & Christie
lender.loan_because: We are small business owners in the USA. We appreciate the other people of the world starting their small businesses, and we are able to help.
lender.occupational_info: We sell accessories and gift items related to the sport of golf.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others in need. It is better to give than to receive. Every person in this world should strive to make a positive difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, I assist the education students to prepare for student teaching

lender.name: hakan
lender.loan_because: everybody deserve a good life and we must help them
lender.occupational_info: we have a family company which makes power plants,pipe lines,factories. I am a metallurgical material and welding engineer.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I think its an essential part of life to give back.
lender.occupational_info: studying mostly. and when I can I pick up my camera.

lender.name: Briana
lender.loan_because: helping others to build their own businesses and provide for their families is the least I can do!

lender.name: virginie
lender.loan_because: it is an empowering way to help others

lender.name: ian
lender.loan_because: i got lucky breaks. people need lucky breaks.
lender.occupational_info: retail trade. buying low, selling higher. providing a service to peoples needs.

lender.name: Josh and Michelle
lender.loan_because: We like to support small-scale, family-oriented businesses, especially those that are gentle to the earth and don't create pollution.
lender.occupational_info:
He - develops power projects that create energy from wind.
She - designs ways of managing water resources with landscapes and plants.

lender.name: Whitney & Brandon
lender.loan_because: Of the sheer difference it makes to each person. I found that, for instance, the Per Capita income of someone in Toga is $350 - so my loan of 25 or 50 makes a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college helping first year students adjust to college in a dorm.

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: It helps people to be fruitful and is an opportunity as a Christian to show God's love to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a weather broadcaster in California

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to share any personal good fortune you may have with others in need.

lender.name: Interloc Films
lender.loan_because: We care.

lender.name: PYGS
lender.loan_because: Christ calls us to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: We are a small Presbyterian Church Youth Group committed to service.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Since we're lucky enough to be in more fortunate situations, let's help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I raise my son full-time.

lender.name: Krupa
lender.loan_because: I've always been proactive in helping out the community and non profits, when I heard about what Kiva does, I thought it was ingenious. I am a giver! Just ask my friends and Family!
lender.occupational_info: I program software applications for an Engineering & construction company in Houston.

lender.name: Ferhat
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel myself responsible to cope with poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an audit manager in a commercial bank.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I think that the overall ideas is simple but good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the biggest airport operators and I try to acquire airports in other countries.

lender.name: Buck
lender.loan_because: The dollar goes a long way. Citizens all over the world have given to me in the past, so I'm very happy to reciprocate.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a computer company.

lender.name: Mischa
lender.loan_because: Access to affordable working capital is vital for every entrepreneur.

lender.name: Necla
lender.loan_because: it is great to help someone who you never know and meet. A mother or a father need your small amount of money in order to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: deal with ads, promotions and all kind of marketing activities

lender.name: Ranny
lender.loan_because: I believe that more equality in economic opportunities will bring stability and hence happiness to this world.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: it's a way of giving that makes a difference you can see

lender.name: Zane Tate
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make music that mixes instrumental Hip Hop, Nu Jazz, Broken Beat, and Downtempo.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: My Catholic faiths calls me to pray, reach out, and support those in need.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gourock Boy
lender.loan_because: 'cause

lender.name: jennifer g
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help. I am lucky enough to be able to lend, so I do.

lender.name: The Correllos
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: this is the best idea I've seen in a long time.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites and create and market information and other types of products online.

lender.name: mariola
lender.loan_because: Small loans without interest could be the brighest idea in order to extend a decent quality of life all over the world and it's important for me to participate in this project.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: other people in the world could really use a few breaks that I've gotten.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I CAN AND I CARE
lender.occupational_info: CARING AND EASY GOING

lender.name: Cathy
lender.occupation: Small business owner in high-tech field

lender.name: ~lg!
lender.loan_because: It's my obligation.

lender.name: SAGA
lender.loan_because: We are a graduate student organization for the School of International Studies at Oklahoma State University. Our membership is composed of students from all over the world. Many of us have first hand knowledge of the need for organizations like KIVA. We hope to help people achieve their economic goals to lessen the level of extreme poverty around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: The Student Association of Global Affairs, SAGA, organizes events that promote awareness of varying cultures and regional problems around the world. We hope to increase the interaction between cultures and in the process be a social service organization which helps to make a difference. Once a year we sponsor a university and community fundraiser, all the profits of which will go towards a KIVA project.

lender.name: Charny
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to be a part of the global community!
lender.occupational_info: I attend a graduate program in economics and teach an introductory micro/macro economics course.

lender.name: Gregory M.
lender.loan_because: I admire people willing to work hard for their dreams. I have worked hard and enjoyed some success. I wish to pass on some of the fruits of my labors so that others may do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: When I was a kid I read this book called: "The Chalice and the Blade." Ever since then my long term goal is to help economically empower third world women.

lender.name: linda and greg
lender.loan_because: we all want happiness and freedom from suffering.
lender.occupational_info: health care/ social work

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all help one another
lender.occupational_info: website designer

lender.name: lindsay and paul
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people all around the world to provide for themselves and their families

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people. It's amazing that I can make a small loan and someone is able to expand their business because of this loan. I am still amazed that I can help someone halfway across the earth and it's that easy!

lender.name: Henning
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of taking the micro credit program online.

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses communicate to customers by writing ads, web content, and other marketing deliverables.

lender.name: Aiden
lender.loan_because: decentralized organizational structures and 'wikinomic' instruments are brilliant and powerful tools only now stepping into the spotlight.
lender.occupational_info: My work is focused on climate change - most of my time is spent on youth engagement around the world, whether politics, arts, activism, etc. The rest is working on climate change impacts on water resources.

lender.name: Soli & Mike
lender.loan_because: Hopefully we can help make a positive difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Wessie
lender.loan_because: It's an interesting situation and their stories and dreams are inspiring
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm in school to try to make a life for myself as well, but being as I strive to make the world a better place I want to try my helping hand here.

lender.name: Marilyn & David
lender.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Take care of children with heart disease

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Make Records

lender.name: Ronnie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help improve existing products & think of new inventions that could/would benefit everyone.

lender.name: Anny Chih
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Khan
lender.loan_because: There is absolutely nothing more rewarding to me than to play a role in helping improve a life. As someone said...."Where you live, should not determine how you live..." and I am a firm believer in that.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like to help ambitious, innovative people with good ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I was in the military and now I work as an aircraft engineer.

lender.name: iinnovate
lender.loan_because: we are really into entrepreneurship and innovation.
lender.occupational_info: We (Julio, Owen, Min Liu, Min Li, Nir and Matt) run a podcast on innovation and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Ernir, Berit & Emil
lender.loan_because: we want to help people realising their ideas
lender.occupational_info: Ernir is a programmer and Berit is a student.

lender.name: Cyril
lender.loan_because: because I think we can do so much for them with what is so little to us. Lending a little of money to Kiva has not changed my life but might have changed some lives elsewhere.

lender.name: Ibrahim I.B
lender.loan_because: I am a local teacher taking cear of streets children.Also duing local business, I beleive that people need to be help by others.
lender.occupational_info: My wark is all about bying used cloth, to take them to the village and make exchange for food iteams and come back to Town sell to sustain my family and my adupted kids. with help form others we can make life better.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital taking care of people who are sick. I also do energy healing work,as well as reflexology.

lender.name: Flagg Road United Church of Christ
Rick
lender.loan_because: I like to support entrepreneurs of all types in their efforts to progress their lives and work.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on building an online media and research company focused on greentech.

lender.name: L-Hads
lender.loan_because: I really like to help people and I want people that are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get ahead in a poor country, believe me, I was born and raised in one.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Police Officer.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: tikkun olam

lender.name: Kim
lender.whereabouts: Roskilde D e n m a r k

lender.name: Lev
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Chemistry reserach.

lender.name: dj80hd
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software and electronic music.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make their life better

lender.name: Meditation7
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the lives of others. And I like to see the faces and the stories of the people to whom the money is going -- I feel connected to them that way.

lender.name: Projectline
lender.loan_because: We loan to 3 businesses each month because we want to support other small businesses around the world. We are different but the same.
lender.occupational_info: Projectline provides marketing consulting and marketing project management services.

lender.name: Walden Green Montessori
lender.loan_because: Every year our class does a unit on world economics. We loan to Kiva because our class feels strongly in the spirit of Social Entrepreneurism. Global outreach should be taught early on in life. Our kids donated money out of their own pockets because they feel strongly that everyone has the right to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: We are a classroom of learners who feel strongly that reaching out to others and promoting peace in the world is of the highest importance!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be able to make a decent living.
lender.occupational_info: My work is too boring to describe with brief periods of insanity.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting entrepreneurship in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work in philanthropy consulting in Washington, D.C.

lender.name: Nancy & Monte
lender.loan_because: That is what we are all here on earth to do...help each other.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that people helping others is the best way to try and make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I sell all kinds of insurance with a family business

lender.name: Clem and Jean Ady
lender.loan_because: We consider our loan to be a teaching tool for Clem's international finance students.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: An investment in people is the most important investment you can make. As humans, we must believe in the power of ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate home buyers during their largest investment/purchase of their lives. By awakening them to the condition of there soon to be home, they are given the proper tools to negotiate for repairs and/or maintain their home or walk away from the deal.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: every night I wonder what I can do to make things better.
lender.occupational_info: I layout and design workbooks and books.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I truly believe people want to help themselves.Sometimes we just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 17 year olds how to analyze and care about the world.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am lucky enough to be able to share.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired firefighter/paramedic and former marine I now enjoy a more sedentary occupation as a writer, photographer and consultant on all things disastrous.

lender.name: Fernando Vieira
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is a smart and efficient way to affect positive change in the world.

lender.name: Tony Das
lender.loan_because: To help those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'll come back to this!

lender.name: Han
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I learn stuff in order to do good.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a large, strong family, a good job, and a community that I love. My family and I are lucky and have what we need. Other people are going to make a lot better use of this money than we would!
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers, youth workers, and community leaders to improve schools and give young people a better start in life.

lender.name: Zelena
lender.loan_because: Because I can. I feel very lucky to be able to stay at home with my 2 kids and see them grow. And I believe that with little contributions like these anyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my baby and take car of the house. I also do some freelance graphic design. Basically, I work from my home using my computer to create magazines, advertising, and anything that can be printed or viewed on a computer.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have seen so much need in this world and am compelled to action.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for an NGO dedicated to improving the lives of orphaned and destitute children around the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on biological problems using computers.

lender.name: Ara
lender.loan_because: We are all connected in ways we don't even know about; Kiva is a way we can choose to be connected.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate. Therefore it is my responsibility to use my resources to help other people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds to make book purchases for the local University Library. And I enjoy being with my two grandchildren, one of whom is in the photo with me.

lender.name: Lynn & Janet
lender.loan_because: Our daughter got us started by giving us two $25 credits to be loaned out.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I want to help give back.
lender.occupational_info: I run a technology Company.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I feel connected, invested way beyond any financial commitment and making a difference 1/2 a world away, well that just feels darn good!
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home because in my job I use my computer and telephone to complete my work administering different loan/grant programs for companies that are growing their business.

lender.name: Eric & Liz
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate in that family and friends have helped us out when we were in need. We just want to pass that kindness on.

lender.name: M.A.M.P.
lender.loan_because: I am blessed, having recovered from paralysis of mercury poisoning--(dental amalgams are 50-74% mercury and leak 24/7 into our brains) after refusing a wheelchair and firing Mayo Clinic. Good to 'buck the system' and go your own way, recover our real wealth--our health.
lender.occupational_info: I launch new ventures to make the world a better place in US, Europe, Arab Gulf and emerging markets.

lender.name: Theresa from Minnesota
lender.loan_because: Once I needed the help to raise my young childen. Now I care to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office setting where my skills consist of using different applications on the computer. Customer satisfaction through service sales orders and other multi-tasks. I also work second job on weekend as a care attendant at retirement home. Help elderly people with daily needs.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to receive help when I needed it -- it is nice to be able to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to play the piano.

lender.name: Estelle
lender.loan_because: Even a small amount of support can make a tremendous difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help filmmakers assemble the pieces of their footage to create a compelling story.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who desire to be a productive part of their society. I prefer to loan to those who are either producing goods on their own, selling items locally produced (not imported), or providing a needed service in their local community. I encourage others involved with Kiva to also have this critical view for lending. We as a community must avoid becoming the funding source for cheap imported goods to those who receive loans, especially when it undercuts the ability of their local economy to then produce those same goods. Import businesses should be a last resort, and only done if there is absolutely no hope for starting local production. It is also important not to try and leverage a change in cultures just for the sake of inserting a business.
lender.occupational_info: I live in the United States, and work in the U.S. and abroad. In my job, I try to solve complex problems that exist in our society.

lender.name: StatSpeaking
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to live a happy and fulfilled life
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations collect and analyze data to make better decisions

lender.name: Cathy and kids
lender.loan_because: what an awesome opportunity to make a difference in someone's life. we have so much in our life, it is a great way to give back and to teach my children how we can affect change in the world.

lender.name: Lynn and David
lender.occupational_info: I am a portrait photographer. David is an Electrical Technician.

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: It is far better to help individual lives in little ways than to try to change the whole world.
lender.occupational_info: I'd like to think of myself as a writer, a relationship builder, a story teller, a ruffled-feather smoother.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God's word, in Luke 12:48 " From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." We are told to not store up our treasure here on earth, but in heaven.
lender.occupational_info: I work for business owners that employ 150 people. They are opening several new restaurants now. My work involves hiring new workers, helping with problems on the job, handling all the necessary paperwork for payroll and insurance and many other things.

lender.name: Harry Spanglet
lender.loan_because: The Kiva approach is such a great idea.

lender.name: Khrys
lender.loan_because: There are many, but mainly, to give people a chance to improve their circumstances and give their families the life they want. If all that stands between a person and a better life is finances, then we have a responsibility to help. Doing so also serves as a wonderful firsthand testimony to the children that no matter how long it takes, your day will come if you do not give up.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of Project Management. Project Managers are responsible for planning, organizing and controlling projects in order to produce a specific outcome (deliverable). Project Managers work in numerous industries, but the type of projects I work on concern green economics, social benefit and women business owners.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: creating jobs is the only way to fight poverty and improve lives in the long term.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: My wife and I own a small company ourselves so we are very interested in business. We loan because we have traveled extensively and have always admired the people we have seen running small business around the world. We feel micro lending provides a unique opportunity for us to help make a difference to some of the people that really need it. Ultimately we are just very interested in business and are grateful to see and share this interest with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We have a small company called Slate Works where my wife and I hand make home and garden decor out of slate. We sell our slate products to both small businesses and to people that attend craft shows across Canada.

lender.name: Manu
lender.loan_because: One world - one people!!!

lender.name: Errol
lender.loan_because: I grew up in South Africa with poverty never far away and I really believe that helping someone to fish is so much more useful and sustainable than offering them a single fish.
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping to spread the good word about Kiva in the UK.

lender.name: Rodolphe Le Clech
lender.occupation: Teacher of french as a foreign language
lender.loan_because: it's a good compromise between sending money to a charity and doing nothing... I find more useful and interesting funding someone's concrete project than giving anonymously to a big organization. And Kiva's website is very well done! Hopefully more projects to be financed, especially in services and health area, are coming soon.
lender.occupational_info: Mainly teaching french to finnish people.

lender.name: Nanda
lender.occupational_info: I am self employed... I do dabble with New Technology.

lender.name: Jearld & Renee
lender.loan_because: Sometimes the small things we do have a very big impact
lender.occupational_info: We have a wonderful family and feel blessed for the life we have.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can make the world a better place. I can take the blessings God has bestowed upon me and share those blessings with others.

lender.name: Lorri
lender.loan_because: "The life I touch for good or ill will touch another life, and that in turn another, until who knows where the trembling stops or in what far place my touch will be felt." Frederick Buechner
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Corporate Communications department of a large financial institution. I've been to all 7 continents and seen firsthand many of the types of people who are requesting loans.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Empowering entrepreneurs with capital is a key to poverty alleviation.
lender.occupational_info: I help optimize and manage the lending processes of a microfinance firm in India.

lender.name: javier troncoso
lender.loan_because: tengo una salon de belleza que lo gerencio junto a mi esposa y necesitamos un credito para seguir ampliando el local
lender.occupational_info: salon de bellleza-spa lugar de relajacion y recuperacion del estres diario del trabajo

lender.name: Benson
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities that have been presented to me in my life. Even if it is a small gesture I want to support others by helping create opportunity for them.
lender.occupational_info: I provide computer technology consulting and support services primarily to small and mid-size companies.

lender.name: Edry
lender.loan_because: Because we help ourselves by helping others, and it is an excellent example for my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Dr's office answering phones, scheduling appointments and doing other office related tasks. I am also a single mom to a fantastic daughter and leader of a middle school Girl Scout Troop.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: To assist entrepreneurs in developing nations to reach their business goals, earning a living for themselves in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an enviromental firm that designs and manufactures technology that is used for waste water treatment.

lender.name: Andrea & Alex
lender.occupational_info: Andrea is a student studying education. Alex is a student, studying HIV.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference in someones life by sharing part of what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothing and sell it directly to women through fine art/craft shows

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I want to do my share to eliminate world hunger.
lender.occupational_info: I love my garden but also roaming and finding a Dall sheep in Alaska.

lender.name: Lis & Vikki
lender.loan_because: There are few things more satisfying in life than helping others help themselves. With Kiva there is a direct connection to the people we help and, unlike giving to charities, we might get our money back and experience the pleasure of giving all over again.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I know of the great need for employment and business in third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and travel often throughout the world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to improve the health of their communities as well as their own health.

lender.name: Diana K.
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva my loans reach out across the world. It is not a handout...it is a loan. What dignity to not just have a handout but to realize that some one thinks what you are doing is good and that you are responsible. This is immediate...your donations are not bogged down in the red tape of politics or huge organizations were a large percentage of the donations go to the people running the organization.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I loan to stay in the Circulation. If I want my business to be successful, I must help others to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am committed teaching people how to achieve successful, socially responsible lives through the use of the Universal Laws of Attraction and Circulation.

lender.name: Chanel and Josh
lender.occupation: Stay at home mother/ HR Generalist

lender.name: One Flight Up
lender.loan_because: We are a group of artists, designers and business owners committed to the success and support of small entreprenuers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We work with "Results" a grass-roots lobbying group committed to creating the political will to end poverty in our lifetime.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: This is the way it's supposed to be.

lender.name: Storton Family
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to Do! We as a family are very blessed and would like to give others opportunities they might not otherwise have available, while teaching our children the importance of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and very active through numerous non-profit activities.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: I love Christ

lender.name: Chad, Katie & Family
lender.loan_because: We loan as a family who runs a small food business to directly support others working in food businesses to support their own family.
lender.occupational_info: Chad runs a small food company that sells treats at a local Farmer's Market, and his main job is at a company that builds websites; his job is to ensure that each website is built to do what the client needed it to do. Katie is a former 2nd grade teacher and stays home raising our young family.

lender.name: James & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: If you give someone a fish, you feed them for a day, but if you teach them how to fish, you feed them for life! These entrepreneurs are learning how to fish and therefore making it better for themselves and everyone around them! Self reliance is the key! Way to go! If everyone can help, we can solve lots of problems! Please help each other when you can!
lender.occupational_info: TEST TEST TEST

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I wish to help folk out of the poverty trap, recognizing that my lifestyle originally contributed to that. I hope to encourage others to participate and pressure governments to change trading practices.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Episcopal priest responsible for a church of 200 families

lender.name: Hal
lender.loan_because: I feel like this is a great way to help folks less fortunate than me. If I was in a situation like these budding entrepreneurs I would give anything to have resources available like this. I'm glad to be able to help them in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm one of many tasked to defend the US and it's interests from the skies. Specifically from the flight deck of the USS Kitty Hawk.

lender.name: Elliott
lender.occupation: Business manager, Ceo of Glass Company.
lender.loan_because: Giving someone else a window of opportunity really makes you feel good.
lender.occupational_info: My work consists of Dealing with glass blown art work. Buying them from a place at low demand and selling them in a place where the demand is high. Using connections to my advantage. NETWORKING!

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: i know how it is to have a dream and need $$ to persue it.

lender.name: Linda Martin
lender.loan_because: I represent my covenant group at the Unitarian Universalist Church of Arlington. We donate $5 each, monthly to build our loan fund. This is our group service project.

lender.name: Jordan,Emily and Sophie
lender.loan_because: We decided as a family to loan this money. We feel blessed to have money to loan.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life. I want to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have mental and emotional challenges. I help them to help themselves . . . kind of like Kiva does. Oh . . . while I belong to the Cheesehead group on Kiva, I'm a Bears fan.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.occupational_info: I go to school in Rhode Island. I love to knit, and I love helping others!!! <3

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: I can't not do it.
lender.occupational_info: I help churches and non profits with their accounting needs.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am able and I care
lender.occupational_info: Retired Professor

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the small business owners in creating positive change in communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student of economics at American University in Washington, DC. I work also part-time at a local bank.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I like to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a university in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Annalee
lender.loan_because: We are here to help one another, in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: professional recreator

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Linda and Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lifestyle and to help them be more self sufficient.I like the idea that I can be more connected with who I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I help others sell and purchase homes.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I raised 3 children on my own. I worked very hard to get through school and get a good job. I want to help someone else to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I speak with people who are interested in doing a business deal together, to help them get it done.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to earn a living and to support themselves and their family!
lender.occupational_info: We are establishing a village for orphaned and abandoned children in Guatemala and are now living in Tecpan working on this!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I practice being less attached to materiality while helping others succeed in life.

lender.name: Kari
lender.occupational_info: I crunch numbers into an excel sheet.

lender.name: Your Home-Your Money
lender.loan_because: It will be the right thing to do in the right situation. Personal growth is exciting.
lender.occupational_info:
Our company finds money to help people buy homes in Wisconsin, USA. My business associate Bill and I talk about the things that matter second-most in your life - Your Home-Your Money - on our weekly radio show. We let our listeners decide what's MOST important to them, but we hope life, love, and family are #1.
We hope KIVA enters into YOUR life as you let others get a chance to grow.
Join our ActiveRain KIVA Group at http://activerain.com/groups/KIVA

lender.name: Noreen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: I work with the frail elderly.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I was raised to help others in need. It falls in line with my Lutheran beliefs, my Nebraska upbringing, and my personal ideals.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student, and I used to write about baseball for a living. Now, I'm back to my roots, and I'm a horticulturalist. I grow plants for a living, and sell produce at the Farmer's Market.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I can. It makes me happy to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student majoring in Political Science in Seattle.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a significant difference in many lives. I also am doing it in the spirit of Lent.

lender.name: Mitesh
lender.loan_because: it helps a person.
lender.occupational_info: Doing what I can to improve the world.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: Life is a flip of the coin and I've been more than lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I research heart disease at a biotechnology company.

lender.name: Andrew & Ijeoma
lender.loan_because: God requires us all to help one another. This is one of the most awesome ways to do so. We love KIVA.

lender.name: Segun
lender.loan_because: i want to launch my ideas for telecom firms in Nigeria
lender.occupational_info: My work is basically generating good ideas for solutions to needs of people in use of GSM in Nigeria

lender.name: Oğuz
lender.loan_because: I want to support some people.
lender.occupational_info: I develop to state's land. I researchs to optimum usage for some lands...

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: This is a neat, "virtuous circle" idea with a huge multiplier effect.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a small manufacturing organization.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can. And people need it. Enough said!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: a small loan to one person can be transformed into a community-wide benefit

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I hope I am truly helping to connect the world
lender.occupational_info: I am an English university student and work some hours in the writing assitance office, often with foreign students.

lender.name: Enid
lender.loan_because: It does not take much to change a life. This is something that I can do that may help someone find a smile and be able to provide for generations ahead.

lender.name: Evert
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist.

lender.name: Mary Anne and Al
lender.occupation: retired social worker and software engineer

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it is an amazing way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work as the Web Services Manager for Harford County Public Library in Maryland. I design and maintain websites.

lender.name: Rune Liseth Meyer
lender.loan_because: I find an enormous joy in helping people to adchive their dreams. Hopefully the micro loans will help them to fullfill this! I'm very found of dreams come through, and telling me more about them, might gain loan for you!

lender.name: Rolland
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of ordinary people helping ordinary people, with no government involved--purely voluntary--a helping hand, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage a consulting practice for a large computer company.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: People in my life have given me a hand up, so I feel the need to give others that boost as well.
lender.occupational_info: By day I am a Credit Risk manager for a small Canadian bank and by night I volunteer for a number of international micro finance organizations.

lender.name: mackenzie
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people.

lender.name: Rysiek
lender.loan_because: I can make a major difference in people's lives with minimal inputs and without undermining their dignity or independence.
lender.occupational_info: I help people configure and use collaboration software to improve information management in organizations.

lender.name: Tanner T.
lender.loan_because: this is a convenient way to make a meaningful positive impact.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: help empower people who have not been afforded the same opportunities I have had in life.
lender.occupational_info: Studying International Business and Finance in the United States.
